replies.bodyText: What happens then ? Do we return an error?
replies.author: Zelldon

replies.bodyText: The returned future is completed exceptionally. But the api to pause processing is async, so it is not returned to the client.

replies.bodyText: async means you could complete it right with the error right? But might make it to complex idk
replies.author: Zelldon

replies.bodyText: Yes. It is completed with error. But the actuators that call this method does not wait for the future. It is just trigger and go.
